bibl.title: Ancient Faces. Mummy Portraits from Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: 1 front. coul., nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul., 1 carte.

Originally published in 1997 by Susan WALKER and Morris BIERBRIER, with Paul ROBERTS and John TAYLOR. New edition revised and edited by Susan WALKER and published in conjunction with the exhibition 'Ancient Faces. Mummy Portraits from Roman Egypt ' held at the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, 2000. - 5 essays and a catalogue.
WALKER Susan (Ed.), Ancient Faces. Mummy Portraits from Roman Egypt.
London, British Museum Press, 2000, 4Â°, 168 pp., 1 front. coul., nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul., 1 carte. ISBN 0-7141-2223-8.
